solution_line_template: Adam has a total of {total_balls} balls - {red_balls} red - {blue_balls} blue = <<{total_balls}-{red_balls}-{blue_balls}={pink_and_orange_balls}>>{pink_and_orange_balls} pink and orange balls combined
The number of orange balls, x, is {pink_and_orange_balls} balls / {combined_coefficient} = <<{pink_and_orange_balls}/{combined_coefficient}={orange_balls}>>{orange_balls} balls
